data.eml:eml: A description of the new tardigrade Macrobiotus reinhardti (Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae, harmsworthi group) with some remarks on the oral cavity armature within the genus Macrobiotus Schultze

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Michalczyk, Łukasz, Kaczmarek, Łukasz (2003): A description of the new tardigrade Macrobiotus reinhardti (Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae, harmsworthi group) with some remarks on the oral cavity armature within the genus Macrobiotus Schultze. Zootaxa 331: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156189
